Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and good location”
Reviews.Author: GYK
Reviews.Content: returned 8 days stay western arrived nighttime surprised 2story motel hotel door onto car park inside building missed information dont adverts motel situated extremely worried woodland hills safe residential time anxious returning own late night despite motel night guests extremely quiet parking cars walls soundproofing heard noise coming door bed comfortable little drab colour drip coffee machine ironing board iron microwave fridge tv selection channels electric kettle tea reception office entrance motel 24 hour hot water machine cups milk etc opposite motel set main road ralphs supermarket riteaid delirestaurant coffee bean cafe shopping canyon 10 minute drive western staff extremely helpful friendly efficient prime time shuttle service lax airport ride 45 minutes 1 hour

Reviews.Title: “Convenient stay in the suburbs”
Reviews.Author: Petra_DL
Reviews.Content: preferred busy downtown la hollywood 2030 minute drive hotel reasonably priced stay probably staff friendly quiet near noisy road pretty basic clean except smelled smoke sometimes comfortable bed negative extra lock door broken indoor fridge noisy breakfast complementary it´s basic breakfast pretty hotel nice outdoor pool plenty shops restaurants nearby balcony ours didn´t value money

Reviews.Title: “We stay here when flying from LAX”
Reviews.Author: cmdevenney
Reviews.Content: stay flying lax hotel 3040 min airport depending traffic conveniently located near 101 freeway cute resturants near walking distance clean affordable cool suites whirlpool tub return western time guest service 10

Reviews.Title: “quiet room, super nice staff!”
Reviews.Author: AndeaAnderson
Reviews.Content: stayed night seeing universal studios arrived noon check traffic amusement park hotel price closer park worth breakfast expected waffles wait hard boiled eggs toaster bread bagels etc tables overall pleased stay

Reviews.Title: “OK for the Money”
Reviews.Author: orimarc
Reviews.Content: la huge avoided stay western 237 facing tiny pool quiet staff helpful joke

Reviews.Title: “great stay”
Reviews.Author: sunnyskies99
Reviews.Content: enjoyed stay hotel los angeles purpose exploring chose woodland hills somewhat central super crowded expensive location comfortable quiet lucky building hardly hear sound fridge microwave balcony clean free breakfast westerns day started juice coffee cereal wafflemaker pastry options pool looked cute built hills complex location fantastic directly 101 freeway connects 405 makes getting central la locations pretty painless 20 minutes coast mountain fantastic views directions hotel ventura blvd options eating theres ralphs supermarket coffee bean shopping center directly street definitely recommended travel stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “A Great Stay for the right traveler”
Reviews.Author: Mangonboat
Reviews.Content: western squeezed ventura blvd woodland hills parking hispeed wireless breakfast free clean staff friendly sincere restaurants easy walking distance spend 100 night hilton 2 blocks business traveler exterior doors parking close street noisy night stayed dont frills value

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: hollie2007
Reviews.Content: checking inwe met friendly helpful staff clean lovely terrace seating pool quiet looked perfect relax day seeing sights los angeles internet access available hotel receptionstaff giving directions sights la recommending eat definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Super nice staff, clean & quiet rooms, but beds are too firm.”
Reviews.Author: brieonsunday
Reviews.Content: agree reviewers surprisingly quiet considering hotel main agree reviewers beds comfortable firm bed sore day mine front desk staff super nice knowing building pool couldnt elevator drag bags upstairs note management please leave hallway doors arent install air hallways stifling oh windows cleaned anyway light breakfast included rate nice parking wifi free bonus days value overall

HotelInfo.Name: BEST WESTERN Woodland Hills Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 21830 Ventura Blvd., Los Angeles, CA 91364
